thread.title: Weak Case to ‘Repeal and Replace’ Tax Bill

author: wsjcom
title: Weak Case to ‘Repeal and Replace’ Tax Bill
text: Jason Furman’s advice to “‘Repeal and Replace’ the Trump Tax Cuts” (op-ed, Jan. 26) as soon as Democrats take back power in Washington is a rehashed formula to Europeanize America that would be a foolish step back economically but a progressive step toward statism that would delight the party’s base. Mr. Furman’s rationale for tax increases is that the Trump tax cuts will starve Washington of revenues and produce enormous deficits. He gives no credence to the argument that lower taxes spur economic growth that eventually will generate higher-than-projected tax revenue. He also makes no mention of the escalating entitlement...
